MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to dissemminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: - Added OpenOffice.org support - Added translations for Romanian, Spanish and Italian - Improved Manual Page (manpage) - Now works on Bash v3 and newer

English.Keywords: regex, regexp, regular expression, wizard, interactive, console, terminal, free, tool, convert, text, simple, Linux, Mac, Windows, CLI, GPL
English.Char_Desc_80: Regular Expression wizard that converts human sentences to regexes.
English.Char_Desc_250: Txt2regex is a Regular Expression wizard that converts human sentences to regexes. In a simple interface, just answer to questions and build your own regex for Emacs, Javascript, MySQL, OpenOffice.org, Perl, PHP, Python, SED, VBscript, Vim and more.
English.Char_Desc_450: Txt2regex is a Regular Expression wizard that converts human sentences to regexes. In a simple interactive interface, you just answer to questions and build your own regex for a large variety of softwares and programming languages: AWK, ed, egrep, Emacs, expect, find, gawk, grep, lex, lisp, mawk, MySQL, OpenOffice.org, Perl, PHP, Postgres, Procmail, Python, SED, Tcl, VBscript, VI, Vim. Translated to 10 languages, it also supports POSIX classes.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
Txt2regex is a Regular Expression wizard that converts human sentences to regexes.
In a simple interactive interface, you just answer to questions and build your own regex for a large variety of softwares and programming languages: AWK, ed, egrep, Emacs, expect, find, gawk, grep, lex, lisp, mawk, MySQL, OpenOffice.org, Perl, PHP, Postgres, Procmail, Python, SED, Tcl, VBscript, VI, Vim.
Already translated to 10 languages, it features support for POSIX classes, smart group balance control, metacharacters information table and regex automatic generation for frequently used patterns.
Geek note: txt2regex is a shell script 100% written with Bash builtin commands. No external command is used.
